name: Gianforte's win represents all that is wrong with the GOP and current American politics. We are electing abusive, bigoted, egomaniacal fascists. I pray we can turn the tide in 2018, but the next few years are going to be brutal.

content.html: Gianforte's win represents all that is wrong with the GOP and current American politics. We are electing abusive, bigoted, egomaniacal fascists. I pray we can turn the tide in 2018, but the next few years are going to be brutal.
